remarks: The value of a substituted singleton.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
mrsubffval.c $e |- C = ( mCN ` T ) $.
mrsubffval.v $e |- V = ( mVR ` T ) $.
mrsubffval.r $e |- R = ( mREx ` T ) $.
mrsubffval.s $e |- S = ( mRSubst ` T ) $.
mrsubcv $p |- ( ( F : A --> R /\ A C_ V /\ X e. ( C u. V ) ) -> ( ( S ` F ) ` <" X "> ) = if ( X e. A , ( F ` X ) , <" X "> ) ) $.
